name: shrivelled
content:

dry, smaller than normal, and covered with lines as if by crushing or folding: Those oranges were looking old and shrivelled, so I threw them out. Two shrivelled bunches of flowers mark the spot where he died. She has become old and shrivelled.
much smaller than is needed or wanted: The company has attempted to boost its shrivelled share price. See
shrivel
